name: Ponnzle
description:
Ponzzle is an puzzle-platformer game where you have to find a way to reach the door.

Are fences blocking you from reaching the door? Rotate  the map 90 degrees to break the fences with the laser and reach the door! Avoid touching the lasers and watch out for the fireballs.

Take care your stamina and HP. Stamina may decrease while staying above the water.

CONTROLS 

A - S - D - W or Left - Right - Up - Down Arrow Keys to MOVE.

" TAB " for rotating map 90 degree.
